title: Search called off for baby washed away in Pennsylvania flash flood
description: A search for 9-month-old Conrad Sheils was called off Wednesday, 12 days after he washed away in a flash flood in Bucks County, Pennsylvania.

title: 1 in 6 toddlers have not completed childhood vaccine series, study finds
description: A new study found one in six toddlers have not completed a childhood vaccine series, which experts say speaks to a wider trend of lagging vaccination rates among kids.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried should be jailed until trial, prosecutor says, citing bail violations
description: A prosecutor has asked a judge to immediately jail FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, saying he violated his bail conditions by releasing information meant to harass a key witness against him

title: Sinead O'Connor, 'Nothing Compares 2 U' singer, dead at 56
description: Acclaimed Irish singer-songwriter and activist Sinead O'Connor has died at the age of 56.

title: How Hunter Biden's plea deal fell apart, for now, during dramatic 3-hour hearing
description: U.S. District Judge Maryellen Noreika scrutinized nearly every facet of Hunter Biden's plea deal, prompting shrugs, exhales, frantic glances and expressions of discontent

title: British man who served 17 years in prison for rape has conviction quashed thanks to new DNA evidence
description: A British man who served 17 years for rape has had his conviction quashed by the country’s Court of Appeal after recently-obtained DNA evidence linked another potential suspect to the crime

title: DNA test helps identify body of Korean War soldier from Georgia
description: DNA analysis has helped scientists identify the remains of a U.S. Army soldier from Georgia who was killed during the Korean War

title: Mother punched in face while she held her baby sues Los Angeles sheriff's department
description: A woman who was punched in the face by a deputy as she held her baby is suing the Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department

title: Store owner charged with murder in Black teen's killing fights warrant over business records
description: A South Carolina store owner who is facing a murder charge after police said he chased and shot a Black 14-year-old customer has asked a judge to stop a search warrant for his business records

title: Major automakers unite to build electric vehicle charging network to rival Tesla's
description: Seven major automakers say they’re joining forces to build a North American electric vehicle charging network that would rival Tesla’s and nearly double the number of fast-charging plugs in the U.S. and Canada

title: WATCH:  Crane catches fire, partially collapses in midtown Manhattan
description: Dramatic video shows the moment a crane in midtown Manhattan partially collapsed after catching fire, crashing onto the street below. Multiple people were injured, officials say.

title: Dangerous heat and severe storms head for Northeast
description: More than a third of the United States is on alert for hot temperatures amid a deadly heat wave that has plagued the country for weeks.

title: Federal appeals court halts Missouri execution, leading state to appeal
description: A federal appeals court panel has halted next month’s planned execution of a 45-year-old Missouri man convicted of killing a 6-year-old girl, though the state is appealing

title: Actor Kevin Spacey found not guilty on sexual assault charges in London
description: Twelve jurors at the Southwark Crown Court had begun deliberating at about noon on Monday following a three-week trial.

title: 6 injured as crane partially collapses in midtown Manhattan
description: A crane caught fire and partially collapsed off a high-rise building in midtown Manhattan during Wednesday morning's commute, according to officials.

title: US steps up warnings to Guatemalan officials about election interference
description: The U.S. is sending stronger signals to Guatemalan authorities to back off interference in the country's current election.

title: Singapore hangs man for drug trafficking; will hang first woman in 19 years
description: Singapore has executed a man for drug trafficking and is set to hang a woman on Friday

title: Top Russian cybersecurity executive sentenced to 14 years for treason
description: A Russian court on Wednesday sentenced the head of one of the country’s top cybersecurity companies to 14 years in prison for high treason

title: Hunter Biden live updates: Republicans urge judge to block Hunter Biden plea deal
description: President Joe Biden's son Hunter Biden is appearing in a Delaware courthouse Wednesday to formally agree to the plea deal he struck last month with federal prosecutors.

title: Bowe Bergdahl's conviction vacated by federal judge
description: Former U.S. Army Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl had his conviction vacated by a federal judge, who said a military judge had failed to disclose a potential conflict of interest.

title: Greece remains on 'high alert' for wildfires as heat wave continues
description: Greece remained on "high alert" for wildfires on Wednesday, when high temperatures were again expected, the Greek Fire Service said.

title: Typhoon blows off roofs, floods villages and displaces thousands in Philippines
description: Typhoon Doksuri has ripped tin roofs off of homes, flooded low-lying villages, knocked out power and displaced more than 12,000 people as it smashes into a small island and lashes northern Philippine provinces with ferocious wind and rain

title: Black women saw declines in fetal mortality rates but were double national average
description: A new CDC report published Wednesday saw fetal mortality rates among Black women fall 4% from 2020 to 2021, but the rates were still nearly double the national average.

title: Judge vacates desertion conviction for former US soldier captured in Afghanistan
description: A judge has vacated the military conviction of Bowe Bergdahl, the former U.S. Army soldier who pleaded guilty to desertion after he left his post and was captured in Afghanistan

title: Golden Fire in southern Oregon burns dozens of homes and cuts 911 service
description: A wildfire that started over the weekend in southern Oregon has burned dozens of homes and caused area residents to lose 911 service and internet

title: Kansas football lineman charged in connection with alleged bomb threat
description: University of Kansas football offensive lineman Joseph Krause has been charged with making an aggravated criminal threat that led to the evacuation of a stadium

title: Cigna health giant accused of improperly rejecting thousands of patient claims using an algorithm
description: A federal lawsuit alleges that health insurance giant Cigna used a computer algorithm to automatically reject hundreds of thousands of patient claims without examining them individually as required by California law

title: WATCH:  Sea lions defend their territory at San Diego beach
description: The sea lions at San Diego's La Jolla Cove are sometimes very protective of their territory.

title: WATCH:  Harrowing scenes as drivers flee Sicily wildfires
description: Footage shows drivers and passengers as they attempt to flee deadly wildfires on the Italian island of Sicily.

title: Marines found dead in vehicle in North Carolina identified
description: The Marine Corps has identified the three Marines who were found dead inside a vehicle in North Carolina over the weekend.

title: Trans man's violent arrest under investigation by Los Angeles sheriff's department
description: Emmett Brock, 23, told ABC News that he was beaten by a Los Angeles County Sheriff's deputy after he flipped off the officer.
